name: pm4.78
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

comment: Implication distributes over disjunction. Theorem *4.78 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 121. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2005.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Nov-2012.)
